question: One of your friend lives in another country. You want to spend time working in that country. Write a letter to your friends.In your letter, you should:•	describe why you want to work in that country;•	tell him/her about your skills and experience;•	ask some questions related to work (wage, salary)
text: I hope you are doing well. I am glad to tell you that one of my dreams come true to work in your country Canada. I wanted to let you know that I'll be there next month and will have fun.

As you know working in Canada was my childhood dream, because I have seen my many relatives working overseas, earning a good amount of money and living a lavish life. So, I also wanted to earn more with my hard work. Moreover, I like foreign work culture and ethics.

You already know that I have an experience in Project Management with an experience of 7 years. I have managed over 100+ projects in lavarvel and Prestashop technology. So, I hope that you'll help me in finding a good job for me.

I don't know if you know about this field or not, but if you can let me know what is the average salary an IT person can get that would be great as it will help me make my further plans of coming there.
I hope you'll reply to me soon and all the best.
